import React from 'react' import { ReactComponent as HeartIcon } from '../../images/icons/heart.svg' import { ReactComponent as HeartRedIcon } from '../../images/icons/heart-red.svg' import './Cart.css' import Button from '../../common/Button' import { useSelector } from 'react-redux' import { State } from '../../reducers' import { getWordWithNumberInRightCase } from '../../utils' import { isNil } from 'ramda' function Cart() { const { imageSrc, isProtectedDeal, bookmarks, description, productName, organizationName, clientCount, trust } = useSelector(state => state.product) return (
{ organizationName }
{ productName }
{ bookmarks ? (
Мои закладки
) : (
Добавить в закладки
) }
{ description }
Полное описание
2 500 ₽
1 500 ₽
{ !isNil(clientCount) && (
{ clientCount + ' ' + getWordWithNumberInRightCase(clientCount, [ 'клиент', 'клиента', 'клиентов' ]) }
) }
{ isProtectedDeal ? 'Без риска' : 'Есть риски' }
{ trust }
) } export default Cart
